0.title: Growing Season ([units])
0.subTitle: [stationName]
0.caption: Maximum number of consecutive [units] above zero Celcius. This frost-free season is the approximate length of the growing season, during which there are no freezing temperatures to kill or damage plants. This is calculated from temperature data.

1.title: Growing Season Difference ([units]) From Baseline
1.subTitle: [stationName]
1.caption: Difference between the maximum number of [units] above zero for the year (the frost-free season) and the average for the baseline period, [baseline]. This is calculated from temperature data.
